item.description:
Hello all,

Bigelow Hollow State Park is a beautiful wooded park with pristine lake, perfect for kayaking or swimming. They also allow other flotation devices, so even if you don't have a kayak, you can bring your tubes, floats or floating lounge chairs and linger on the lake! It is located on Rte 171 in Union CT. There is a cost for entry into the state park. Then head on over to Marion's at 58 Moon Rd. Ashford CT for BBQ Potluck and Games! If you don't want to go swimming or Kayaking then meet us over at Marion's later on. Don't forget the $1.00 for Nina our awesome organizer.
item.how_to_find_us: Bigelow Hollow State Park Rte 171 Union CT then onto 58 Moon Rd. Ashford Ct.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Kyaking/Swimming BBQ and Games
